career.name: Kuldip Oswal Hosiery Mills Pvt. Ltd.
career.title: Software Developer and Consultant
description: Made a inventory management system and a booking system for fabric's using FastAPI framework in python with a PostgreSQL database along with a front-end using Next.js and JWT for authentication.
Prioritized easy UI for non-technical people to use.

career.name: State Art Corp.
career.title: Data Migration Internship
description: Implemented measures to prioritize accessibility and maintain data integrity over the course of 2 weeks.
Prioritized accessibility and maintained data integrity throughout the process adding support for multiple users to access database boosting efficiency by 2 folds.

career.name: Chahat Accessories
career.title: Web Development Internship
description: Designed and revamped a new e-commerce store for the online fashion accessories company helping them increasing customer retention by 3 times.
Incorporated bespoke design to elevate the brand's online presence getting them over 5 times more visitors.

career.name: Freelance
